name: Matthias Gr√§f
comment: Mr Pukhan has exceptional abilities in the product development field which he provided during his tenure at Golf Post in an outstanding way. He helped us to find new approaches to our ongoing development tasks and practices. His dedicated performance and strong endurance were very important and a great benefit for the company.

name: Hartmut Wiehle
comment: Mr. Phukan played an integral role in developing and relaunching our new dynamic company website. From designing to deploying a fault-proof website with all its tools and databases within a short time-frame, he completed it all while keeping a close cooperation with the management. Borneel's skills are highly recommended.

name: Valentin Siegert
comment: Borneel displayed an exceptional ability to work independently while maintaining an open and collaborative attitude. His proactive approach to integrating his work seamlessly with the larger research framework and his thoroughness and adaptability made his contributions valuable and impactful.
